last_episode_to_air.name: We All Love Each Other
last_episode_to_air.overview: All is well, or is it?

name: Undone
overview: After getting into a near fatal car accident, Alma discovers she has a new relationship with time and uses this ability to find out the truth about her father’s death.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Season 1 explores the elastic nature of reality through Alma, a twenty-eight-year-old living in San Antonio, Texas. After getting into a car accident and nearly dying, Alma finds she has a new relationship to time. She develops this new ability in order to find out the truth about her father’s death.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, Alma realizes there are deeper mysteries in her family’s past. However, no one in her family is interested in digging into these uncomfortable truths — until she finally convinces Becca to help. As the sisters search for answers, they unravel a complex network of memories and motivations that have shaped who they are today.

episodes.name: The Crash
episodes.overview: After a fight with her sister Becca, Alma gets in a car accident and sees something mysterious.

episodes.name: The Hospital
episodes.overview: While recovering in the hospital from her car accident, Alma talks with her dead father, who has a confusing and compelling request.

episodes.name: Handheld Blackjack
episodes.overview: Alma begins her training with her dad, and tries to get a grip on her new reality.

episodes.name: Moving the Keys
episodes.overview: Alma progresses through training with her dad, and continues to uncover information about his death.

episodes.name: Alone in This (You Have Me)
episodes.overview: Alma realizes Sam has been lying to her and they get into a fight.

episodes.name: Prayers and Visions
episodes.overview: Camila helps out at the church, and accompanies Becca on a food tasting with Reed’s family.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Alma attends Becca and Reed’s wedding while continuing to investigate her father's murder.

episodes.name: That Halloween Night
episodes.overview: Alma goes back to the Halloween night Jacob died and tries to change the past.

episodes.name: The Painting
episodes.overview: Alma pushes her family to look at themeselves.

episodes.name: Mexico
episodes.overview: Alma and Becca go to Mexico!

episodes.name: Reflections
episodes.overview: Alma and Becca discover something about the past.

episodes.name: Lungs
episodes.overview: Alma and Becca meet a stranger.

episodes.name: We All Love Each Other
episodes.overview: All is well, or is it?

As the sisters search for answers, they unravel a complex network of memories and motivations that have shaped who they are today.
